22  Controller::Controller(ros::NodeHandle* _nh, AlleyHoopMVC::Vehicle* v)
23  : AlleyHoopMVC::Controller(v), nh(*_nh)
24  {
25  //read params, if fail set a default value
26  std::string ultrasonic_sensor_topic_name;
27  if(!nh.getParam("AlleyHoop_Sensors/UltrasonicSensor_TopicName",ultrasonic_sensor_topic_name))
28  ultrasonic_sensor_topic_name = "/arduino_slave/ultrasonic_sensor";
29 
30  std::string mono_camera_image_raw_topic_name;
31  if(!nh.getParam("AlleyHoop_Sensors/MonoCameraImageRaw_TopicName",mono_camera_image_raw_topic_name))
32  mono_camera_image_raw_topic_name = "/raspi_camera/image_raw";
33 
34  std::string mono_camera_info_topic_name;
35  if(!nh.getParam("AlleyHoop_Sensors/MonoCameraInfo_TopicName",mono_camera_info_topic_name))
36  mono_camera_info_topic_name = "/raspi_camera/camera_info";
37 
38  std::string lidar_topic_name;
39  if(!nh.getParam("AlleyHoop_Sensors/Lidar_TopicName",lidar_topic_name))
40  lidar_topic_name = "/scan";
41 
42  std::string depth_camera_info_topic_name;
43  if(!nh.getParam("AlleyHoop_Sensors/DepthCameraInfo_TopicName",depth_camera_info_topic_name))
44  depth_camera_info_topic_name = "/depth_camera/camera_info";
45 
46  std::string depth_camera_pcl_topic_name;
47  if(!nh.getParam("AlleyHoop_Sensors/DepthCameraPcl_TopicName",depth_camera_pcl_topic_name))
48  depth_camera_pcl_topic_name = "/depth_camera/points";
49 
50  std::string imu_topic_name;
51  if(!nh.getParam("AlleyHoop_Sensors/ImuSensor_TopicName",imu_topic_name))
52  imu_topic_name = "/arduino_slave/imu_sensor";
53 
54  //setup sensors, add to controller base class for life line managing and update routine
55  ultrasonic_sensor_1 = new AlleyHoopROSSensors::UltrasonicSensor("ultrasonic_sensor", _nh, ultrasonic_sensor_topic_name);
56  addSensor(ultrasonic_sensor_1);
57  if(verboseMode) std::cout << " ultrasonic_sensor subscribed to " << ultrasonic_sensor_topic_name << std::endl;
58 
59  mono_camera_1 = new AlleyHoopROSSensors::MonoCamera("mono_camera_1", _nh, mono_camera_image_raw_topic_name, mono_camera_info_topic_name);
60  addSensor(mono_camera_1);
61  if(verboseMode) std::cout << " mono_camera_1 subscribed to " << mono_camera_image_raw_topic_name << " and " << mono_camera_info_topic_name << std::endl;
62 
63  lidar1 = new AlleyHoopROSSensors::Lidar("lidar1", _nh, lidar_topic_name);
64  addSensor(lidar1);
65  if(verboseMode) std::cout << " lidar1 subscribed to " << lidar_topic_name << std::endl;
66 
67  depth_camera_1 = new AlleyHoopROSSensors::DepthCamera("depth_camera_1", _nh, depth_camera_pcl_topic_name, depth_camera_info_topic_name);
68  addSensor(depth_camera_1);
69  if(verboseMode) std::cout << " depth_camera_1 subscribed to " << depth_camera_pcl_topic_name << " and " << depth_camera_info_topic_name << std::endl;
70 
71  imu = new AlleyHoopROSSensors::Imu("imu", _nh, imu_topic_name);
72  addSensor(imu);
73  if(verboseMode) std::cout << " imu subscribed to " << imu_topic_name << std::endl;
74 
75  //setup feature finders
76  featureFinder = new FeatureFinder(_nh);
77 
78 
79  //setup path finders
80  AlleyHoopROSUtils::Vector3 _startPosition;
81  AlleyHoopROSUtils::Vector3 _nodeSizes(2, 2, 2);
82  pathFinder = new PathFinder(_nh, _startPosition, _nodeSizes);
83  }

85  Controller::~Controller()
86  {
87  if(featureFinder != nullptr)
88  {
89  std::cout << "deleted feature finder" << std::endl;
90  delete featureFinder;
91  }
92 
93  if(pathFinder != nullptr)
94  {
95  std::cout << "deleted path finder" << std::endl;
96  delete pathFinder;
97  }
98  }

100  bool Controller::update()
101  {
102  if (ros::ok())
103  {
104  //update routinely
105  if(verboseMode) std::cout << "-------------" << "\nController: updating sensors...." << std::endl;
106  updateSensors(); //used for conventional implementation // for ros the following line, 'spinOnce()' is called instead
107  ros::spinOnce();
108 
109  //get sensors data
110  int ultrasonic_sensor_data = ultrasonic_sensor_1->getData();
111  cv_bridge::CvImagePtr image_data_foward = mono_camera_1->getData();
112  sensor_msgs::PointCloud2 pcl_data_foward = depth_camera_1->getData();
113 
114  //find objects
115  if(verboseMode) std::cout << "-------------" << "\nController: finding features...." << std::endl;
116  std::list<AlleyHoopROSUtils::Feature*> objects;
117  if(featureFinder->findObjectsOnImage(objects, image_data_foward))
118  {
119  //featureFinder->processDepthDataOnFeatures(objects, pcl_data_foward);
120  }
121 
122  //TODO base the signs on cropped versions of the found objects
123  std::list<AlleyHoopROSUtils::Feature*> trafficSigns;
124  if(featureFinder->findTrafficRulesOnImage(trafficSigns, image_data_foward))
125  {
126 
127  }
128 
129  //find the road
130  std::list<AlleyHoopROSUtils::Feature*> roadFeatures;
131  featureFinder->findRoadOnImage(roadFeatures, image_data_foward);
132 
133  //make decisions
134  if(verboseMode) std::cout << "-------------" << "\nController: making desicions...." << std::endl;
135  if(AlleyHoopROSCore::Vehicle* ah_vehicle = dynamic_cast<AlleyHoopROSCore::Vehicle*>(vehicle))
136  {
137 
138  //fix feature transforms to reference from the center of the vehicle
139  for(std::list<AlleyHoopROSUtils::Feature*>::iterator feature_iter = objects.begin(); feature_iter != objects.end(); feature_iter++)
140  {
141 
142  }
143 
145 
146 
147  //find path to target position
148  if(verboseMode) std::cout << "-------------" << "\nController: finding path...." << std::endl;
149  pathFinder->findPath(ah_vehicle->transform, ah_vehicle->destination, objects, roadFeatures);
150 
152  //ah_vehicle->
153 
154  //Ultrasonic sensor example
155  if(ultrasonic_sensor_data < 30 && ultrasonic_sensor_data > 0)
156  {
157  //turn on leds
158  ah_vehicle->led1->setState(true);
159  ah_vehicle->led2->setState(true);
160  }
161  else
162  {
163  //turn on led
164  ah_vehicle->led1->setState(false);
165  ah_vehicle->led2->setState(false);
166  }
167  }
168 
170 
171 
172 
173  //cleanup
174  if(verboseMode) std::cout << "-------------" << "\nController: clearing features...." << std::endl;
175  for(std::list<AlleyHoopROSUtils::Feature*>::iterator feature_iter = objects.begin(); feature_iter != objects.end(); feature_iter++)
176  {
177  delete (*feature_iter);
178  }
179  for(std::list<AlleyHoopROSUtils::Feature*>::iterator feature_iter = roadFeatures.begin(); feature_iter != roadFeatures.end(); feature_iter++)
180  {
181  delete (*feature_iter);
182  }
183  for(std::list<AlleyHoopROSUtils::Feature*>::iterator feature_iter = trafficSigns.begin(); feature_iter != trafficSigns.end(); feature_iter++)
184  {
185  delete (*feature_iter);
186  }
187  objects.clear();
188  roadFeatures.clear();
189  trafficSigns.clear();
190 
191  if(verboseMode) std::cout << "-------------" << "\n Controller: Succesfully executed actions...." << std::endl;
192  return true;
193  }
194 
195  std::cout << "-------------" << "Controller: program terminated" << std::endl;
196  return false;
197  }
